name: A crude iron talisman
data: It increases the users strength a good amount.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has decent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'grim resolve'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
